Keywords: Atlantis , Justice League , Monster , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Arthur Curry
Special Powers
THE KING OF THE SEVEN SEAS: At the beginning of the game generate 7 water terrain markers anywhere on the map.
THE KING USED THE CONCH: Leadership. When Aquaman uses it and succeeds, after resolutions you may generate a water terrain marker in a square within range -or- generate a Tentacle bystander [MAX 8] in a square of water terrain within range. If a 6 was rolled, you may generate both.
THIS IS A MONARCHY...AND I RULE: Close Combat Expert, Empower. When Aquaman uses Empower, he may treat friendly characters with Dolphin movement symbol occupying water terrain as adjacent.
